title: Basics of JAVA
headline: Learn Java Fast and Simple
description: Java is the current heart of the programming world. This course lets you dive through the basics of the world's most fundamentally learnt and used language.

title: Advanced Machine Learning
headline: Learn ML Approaches and Algorithms
description: Machine Learning is the latest fad in the modern world. Learn the powerful concepts of supervised and unsupervised learning and make this world your own.

title: Web Development Bootcamp
headline: Become a full stack web developer. Build real projects.
description: The only course you need to learn to code and become a full-stack web developer. This course will take you from beginner to mastery. You’ll learn to build fully-fledged websites and web apps for your business or startup.

title: Python Programming
headline: Learn to Program and Analyze Data with Python. Develop programs to gather, clean, analyze, and visualize data.
description: In the Capstone Project, you’ll use the technologies learned throughout the Specialization to design your own applications for data retrieval, processing, and visualization.

title: Programming and Data Structures
headline: Learn basics of data structures using Java
description: Understanding how programming works is essential in many technical disciplines such Information Technology, Software Engineering, Cybersecurity, and Computer Science

title: Software Development Fundamentals
headline: Learn the fundamentals of object-oriented programming in Java, as well as best practices of modern software development.
description: You will use modern development environments and tools for tasks like debugging and unit testing. We will introduce eclipse debugger and Junit
